summary: An old boxing coach helps a young ex-con and teaches him how to box and try to become a professional.
cast: Kelly Adams|Gregor Bador|Frank Braun|Marco Böhme|Caprice Crawford|Daniel Daiginger|Josh Dallas|Henry Garrett|Christof Genesis|Stacy Keach|Thomas Köppen|Leslie Malton|Marcel Mantau|O'Shea Miles|Thorsten Pabst|Hagen Runge|Daniel Minor Rühe|Thomas Schauer
title: The Boxer
